meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Al Badger Keith Marr Bruce Simmons Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1770.

td.p: Al Badger, a software engineer from Monterey, California
Keith Marr, a student & writer originally from Seattle, Washington
Bruce Simmons, a grad student from Minneapolis, Minnesota (whose 4-day cash winnings total $63,599)

tr.td: WILD BILL HICKOK
FOUNTAINS
FILMS OF THE '60s
BOTANY
ODDS & ENDS
PREFIXES

petit

Keith
')
